programme.title: Medicine for Melancholy
programme.desc: A black couple (Wyatt Cenac, Tracey Heggins) in San Francisco discuss issues of race, identity and the growing gentrification of their city.

programme.title: Burning Man
programme.desc: After the death of his wife (Bojana Novakovic), a father (Matthew Goode) gives in to grief and anger and uses casual sex to cope with his pain.

programme.title: Mary Shelley
programme.desc: Lord Byron challenges his houseguests to write a ghost story, which leads Mary Shelley to begin her novel Frankenstein.

programme.title: Red Joan
programme.desc: A retired widow living in the suburbs is arrested by the British Secret Service for providing classified scientific information, and during interrogation, relives the dramatic events that shaped her life.

programme.title: 44 Inch Chest
programme.desc: A vengeful car salesman (Ray Winstone) and his brutal buddies kidnap his wife's lover, then try to decide if they should kill the man or spare him.

programme.title: Ophelia
programme.desc: Ophelia comes of age as lady-in-waiting for Queen Gertrude, and her singular spirit captures Hamlet's affections. As lust and betrayal threaten the kingdom, Ophelia finds herself trapped between true love and controlling her own destiny.

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: A youngster (Ellar Coltrane) makes the long journey to adulthood over the span of 12 years, as he, his sister (Lorelei Linklater) and his mother (Patricia Arquette) move around Texas.

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: A well-to-do Atlanta teen (Jules Brown) documents a summer spent in the Brooklyn housing projects with his devout grandfather (Clarke Peters).

programme.title: Bare
programme.desc: A young woman's (Dianna Agron) friendship with a drug-dealing drifter (Paz de la Huerta) evolves into a lesbian romance.

programme.title: Sky
programme.desc: A Parisian woman (Diane Kruger) embarks on a life-changing trip through the California desert after breaking up with her boorish husband (Gilles Lellouche).

programme.title: Una noche
programme.desc: Raul dreams of escaping to Miami. When he is accused of assault, he convinces his friend Elio to help him cross the ocean.

programme.title: The Narrows
programme.desc: A 19 year old photography student has to balance his neighborhood roots with a sophisticated world while attending NYU.

programme.title: Queen of the Desert
programme.desc: Gertrude Bell's life as an explorer, cartographer, and archaeologist for the British Empire.
